data.text: @beth_nosnhoj Please get him to the A&E quick
@beth_nosnhoj Strip him....cold cloth on his wrists and forehead might help

@beth_nosnhoj Oh crap. I know this fear all too well. Good luck, hopefully it won't get any worse.

Watch for febrile seizures with high temperature too. Scared the living crap out of me when my tiny daughter started seizing on my lap! Long long time ago now, she recovered well.

@AvaMILF @beth_nosnhoj Not criticism rather advice from a single father who has been there plenty and now has 4 awesome teenagers. I have spent more days and nights with sick kids than I care to remember but they are made to survive. We often forget that.

@beth_nosnhoj May he get well soon.
Don’t stress urself, the temp will go down. Use some #paracetamol like #Panadol or #Calpol.
@beth_nosnhoj A cold face cloth on the back of the neck can help lower the temp
@beth_nosnhoj Cold flannel on the child's forehead and calpol or similar. Try not to worry too much (easy to say!) because you can't afford to become ill yourself xxx
